items.sentence: Tom told me he was going to clean up his room.
Tom told me he was hoping to get into Harvard.
Tom told me he was planning to move to Boston.
I have a feeling you\'re going to like Boston.
I never imagined I\'d feel this way about you.
Tom has been to your place before, hasn\'t he?
I want you to know that I\'ll do that for you.

You and Tom were happy together, weren\'t you?

We\'ve achieved a lot in the past three years.
